title: Kutlwanong: a place of hearing
creator_contributor_role: South Africa. Ministry of Information, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped children - Care and treatment

description: Story of the Rustenberg Dutch Reformed Church School for the deaf, mute, and blind. Tells how an unwanted young Tswana girl finds herself and achieves a secure place, not only in her family, but in the community. The emotional reaction of the young girl who hears for the first time in her life is a feature of this film.
